page.title: 12OUR HOBBIES
page.content: We did a{survey}of the{hobbies of the{25}Junior children{(7-11 year {olds)}at{Crosscrake}Primary School. This is what we found:- Athletics{1 }Football{6 BMXing{2 }Gardening{2 Badminton{1 }Horses{2 Billiards{1 }Judo{3 Birdwatching{3 }Pets{22 Canoeing{2 }Pool{2 Collecting Badges{7 }Pressed - - Coins{4 }Flowers{2 - - Guidebooks{1}Roller - - Ornaments{5 }Skating{9 - - Postcards{6 }Sewing{3 - - Posters{5 }Snooker{6 - - Stamps{6 }Swimming{12 - - Stickers{15 }Table Tennis{1 - - Stones{1 }Tennis{12 Cricket{5 }Waterskiing{1 Cycling{5 }Windsurfing{1 Farming{4 }Woodwork{3
